overview:
Maria Aubrey is Senior Vice President, Operations at SDTC. She has more than 20 yearsâ€™ experience in financial, operational and organizational management. Most recently, Maria served as Chief Operating Officer of XIA Systems Corporation of Ottawa, Canada.

Earlier in her career, she spent 17 years with DMR Consulting Group, where she held various operations management positions of increasing responsibility, both locally and at the global level. In 1998, she joined AMEC Technologies Limited as Vice President, as part of a business transformation program. She has also served as President of Spectrocan, where she successfully led that companyâ€™s re-positioning effort.

Maria is an experienced administrator who specializes in operating and managing organizations to ensure they deliver high-quality services.
